All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BuyInvestmentPanel
BuyInvestmentPanel is a JPanel that allows users to input details to buy a new investment for their portfolio.
getGainPanel
getGainPanel is a JPanel that allows users to get the gain of investments of their existing investments in their portfolio.
Investment
This superclass represents the investment superclass that has all the mutualfunds and stocks as its subclasses of a portfolio.
MutualFund
This class represents a mutual fund investment that is part of a portfolio.
Portfolio
This class represents a Portfolio that will manage stocks and mutualfunds
PortfolioGUI
* PortfolioGUI is the main GUI class for the ePortfolio application.
searchPanel
searchPanel is a JPanel that allows users to search for investments in their portfolio based on various criteria.
SellPanel
Sell Panel is a JPanel that allows users to input details to sell a new investment for their portfolio.
Stock
This subclass represents a stock investment that is part of a portfolio.
updatePanel
updatePanel is a JPanel that allows users to update details of their existing investments in their portfolio.
WelcomePanel
* WelcomePanel is a JPanel that displays a welcome message and instructions * for using the ePortfolio application.
